name: Sylvetica
comment:
>>44272875
In quiet anticipation of things to come, you gulp down a lesser healing potion as well.

> [[ HP: 16 / 35 ]]

The party begins to surround the table, and you look over what Nel's got his eye on.

> Inventory [[ platter ]]
pickled moonroot x8

“Looks legit.” You say, sarcastically. It's a number of small, sealed jars containing a faintly-glowing bluish suspension.

“Maybe it's a purified restorative, like moonroot elixir.” Aelriss says. “Or, maybe it's just been fermenting for so long that it's twice as toxic as the raw herb. That sounds more likely.”

“Hey, look on the bright side.” Vyx says. “Twice the toxicity means twice the potency, y'know.”

“She's got a point.” Donnel shrugs. “Kind of a stupid one, but a point nontheless.”

“Is the implication here that people used to just eat this stuff for fun?” Aelriss asks.

“You probably had to be a little intoxicated to invent the kinds of stuff we've seen in here.” Ayla shrugs. “So, yeah, I guess. Take it if you want it, but don't make it your first resort.”

“What about the fountain?” You ask, dipping your finger tentatively. It doesn't seem to have any effect—when you touch it to your tongue, the effect is instantaneous.

> [[ HP: 31 / 35 ]]
> [[ Moonroot Poisoning: Dizzy ]]
> [[ Stunned ]]
> [[ Paralyzed ]]

A single drop, and the worst of your wounds close in an instant. But your muscles lock up; your skin tightens uncomfortably, and you collapse into a sitting position. You're stunned for another couple of seconds—then, left in a state where you can't do much more than talk and move your arms.

“Ascheritte! Are you alright?” Kainzo asks.

“Fine?” You say, through clenched teeth.

“Vitae.” Nel says, looking over a full glass. “Looks like it's a powerful restorative.”

> [[ Continued ]]
